entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Primitive collections backed by a private field doesn't get discovered by convention #34815
  • Revert BinSkim workaround #34814
    Backlog
  • migrations script generates empty script #34811
  • Investigate rising use of memory which may indicate a leak #34809

Closed

  • Error: Value cannot be null parameter name key #33831
    10.0.0
  • Mismatch in Count and ToListAsync Results When Using Global Query Filters on Joined Entities #34810
  • c# script Library\PackageCache\com.unity.ugui\Runtime\UGUI\UI\Core\Layout\LayoutRebuilder.cs(21,44): error CS0311: The type 'UnityEngine.UI.LayoutRebuilder' cannot be used as type parameter 'T' in the generic type or method 'ObjectPool<T>'. There is no implicit reference conversion from 'UnityEngine.UI.LayoutRebuilder' to 'ObjectPoolEvents'. #34812
  • Can persist IEnumerable<string>, but not retrieve #34685
  • The SaveChanges can't track items created by Enumerable.Repeat #34747
  • List<string> property causes inclusion of additional columns that are not used in the projection. #34805

PullRequests

Created

  • Throw when a nested entity type is mapped to a different JSON column. #34816
  • Reverting the BinSkim target directory #34813
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34808

Merged

  • Fix: Value cannot be null parameter name key #34730
  • [release/8.0] Remove referencing indexes when reconfiguring a property as a navigation #34651
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.11
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #34807
  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #34806

Updated

  • Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34803
  • [release/9.0] Use 8.x Microsoft.Extensions.* packages #34769
    providers-beware, Servicing-approved
